info.title: Manage multiple units under one main listing with ease.
info.description: Multi-Units allow you to manage several subunits within a single rental. Each subunit can have its own pricing, availability, and details.

example.label: For example:
example.text: An apartment building with 5 identical rooms can be listed as a Multi-Unit rental.
